PerfectNetExp.abs: 飞燕草指飞燕草属(Consolida)植物；特指飞燕草(Consolida ajacis)，英语称rocket larkspur。飞燕草Consolida ajacis 　　翠雀与飞燕草在.
观赏椒 Capsicum-黄泷种子有限公司 ... 牻牛儿草 Eryngium 千鸟草 Consolida 千日红 Gomphrena.

means.word_mean: 1. plants having flowers resembling the larkspur's but differing from larkspur's in the arrangement of petals; sometimes included in genus Delphinium
